content: serenity cashmere keyhole scarf by the needletree wanted a stockinette cashmere little neck piece for my mother she is always chilly but struggles to tie bows so went with a keyhole slot couldn t find a nice simple delicate one so wrote this pattern i love the softness of anzula serenity and this is a yarn that wants to touch your skin i like the softness of stockinette over garter stitch and added i-cord edging to help curl the rolling edge not perfect but works here 1 skein anzula serenity #4 needle co 5 sts tapered increase row 1 - 5- knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif row 6 - rs k1 kfb knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif row 7 - ws k1 kfb p to last 3 sl3 wyif repeat 6 and 7 until 40 sts on needle body rs k3 knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif ws k3 purl to last 3 sts sl3wyif repeat these until pieces measures 20 or desired length keyhole end row 1 rs - k3 ssk knit to last 5 sts k2tog sl3wyif row 2 ws - k3 purl to last 3 sts sl3wyif repeat row 1 and 2 until 30 sts on the needle row 1 rs - k3 ssk ssk knit to last 7 sts k2tog k2tog sl3wyif row 2 ws - k3 purl to last 3 sts sl3wyif repeat row 1 and 2 until 22 sts on the needle keyhole row row 1 rs - k3 knit 4 bind off 8 k4 sl3wyif row 2 ws - k3 purl 4 cast on 8 with backwards loop method purl 4 sl3wyif row 3 rs - k3 ssk knit to last 5 sts k2tog sl3wyif row 4 ws - k3 purl to last 3 sts sl3wyif row 5 rs - k3 ssk knit to last 5 sts k2tog sl3wyif row 6 ws - k3 purl to last 3 sts sl3wyif 18 sts on needle i-cord bind off rs facing you cable co 3 sts k2 ssk thru back loop place those 3 stitches back on the left needle repeat this until 3 sts left bind off those 3 sts block and weave in your ends video link for the i-cord bind-off i used here
